title: The more I take this Bio class, the more I realize three things:
body:
1. Our existence is the byproduct of accidental chains of molecules stuck in an action/reaction loop, which somehow gave way to life.

2. We exist only to allow these accidental chains of molecules to replicate.

3. Because our existence is a tool for these molecules, and because they control our existence (ie everything we do is an aggregation of all of these reactions), free will cannot exist by any means. 


In essence, we are machines.
